meta.description: Optimize the grain mix to meet nutrient requirements for sheep at minimum cost.

sets.name: GRAINS
sets.description: Different types of grains available for feeding.

params.name: nutrient_content
params.description: Nutrient content per pound of each grain.

params.name: grain_cost
params.description: Cost in cents per pound of each grain.

params.name: min_nutrient_requirement
params.description: Minimum daily nutrient requirement for the sheep.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Amount of each grain to feed the sheep in pounds.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of grains to meet nutrient requirements.

constraints.name: nutrient_A_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure minimum requirement of nutrient A is met.

constraints.name: nutrient_B_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure minimum requirement of nutrient B is met.

constraints.name: nutrient_C_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure minimum requirement of nutrient C is met.

constraints.name: nutrient_D_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure minimum requirement of nutrient D is met.
